title: The Worst Case Of Gaslighting I’ve Ever Seen (Ep 1665)
description:
Justice comes for Juicy. Also, Biden did it. He demanded the media kiss his rear end, and they immediately complied. In this episode I provide the receipts showing they’re covering up this disastrous economy. 

News Picks:


Inflation is surging.


The White House propaganda sessions on the economy must be working. 

It’s about to get a lot worse for Biden. 

Here are the Democrats who fell for the Juicy Smoliet hoax. 

Have aliens visited earth?


A dozen cities blew away their murder records, and they all have this in common. 


Rumble is preparing to take on Amazon. 

Democrats are struggling over their plan to cut taxes for rich liberals. 


This liberal lecturer is raking in huge speaking fees.
